main.name: Akash Barsagadey
main.description: currently employed by Syngenta where I work as a Front End Developer across the range of our products, as well being our lead Front End Developer.
main.bio: I am an adventure seeker, always looking out for new learnings and experiences. In 5.6+ years of my professional life, I have used various JavaScript technologies for building products and business solutions. I am a front-end developer and take a keen interest in JavaScript technologies. My creative nature is reflected in the work I do. I try to develop more creative apps by using my skills to give a better user experience.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to receive further details, get coached or anything else.

testimonials.text: Dear Akash, You have done an excellent job on the e-MAT Project in the area of developing calculation logic which is the heart of the project and the most complex part from a business logic perspective. You worked on multiple revisions of calculation and dealt with numerous data and validation issues with the great level of patience, dedication, and perseverance. Due to your determined execution, We could achieve best quality deliverables and a satisfied customer. I wish you all the best and keep up the good work!

I want to acknowledge the significant contribution made by Akash in developing our first microservice SprayClock on LINE platform. Both of them overcame multiple technical challenges during design, implementation & deployment phases to finally make it working. Reuse of SprayClock from GrowerHub demonstrated that solution developed in one context can be reused in another. BIG THANK YOU to Akash for their determined execution and let's continue with our push to get it over the line and make it LIVE!
